00063   template <typename Domain, typename ValueType>
00064   class ImageContainerBySTLMap: public map<typename Domain::Point,ValueType>
00065   {
00066 
00067   public:
00068 
00069     BOOST_CONCEPT_ASSERT(( CValueType<ValueType> ));
00070     BOOST_CONCEPT_ASSERT(( CDomain<Domain> ));
00071                 
00072                 
00073     typedef typename Domain::Point Point;
00074     typedef typename map<Point,ValueType>::size_type TSizeType;
00075     typedef typename map<Point,ValueType>::iterator Iterator;
00076     typedef typename map<Point,ValueType>::const_iterator ConstIterator;
00077 
00079     class SpanIterator: public Iterator
00080     {
00081       friend class ImageContainerBySTLMap<Domain,ValueType>;
00082 
00083     public:
00084       SpanIterator( const Point & p ,
00085                     const std::size_t aDim ,
00086                     ImageContainerBySTLMap<Domain,ValueType> *aMap ) :   
00087         myStartingPoint( p ),   myDimension ( aDim ),   myMap ( aMap )
00088       {
00089         myPos = myMap->find( p );
00090       }
00091 
00092 
00093       const ValueType & operator*() const
00094       {
00095         return (*myPos).second;
00096       }
00097       
00102       void next()
00103       {
00104         while ((myPos != myMap->end()) && 
00105                ( (*myPos).first.at(myDimension) != myStartingPoint.at(myDimension)))
00106           {
00107             myPos++;
00108           }
00109       }
00110 
00115       void prev()
00116       {
00117         while ((myPos != myMap->end()) && 
00118                ( (*myPos).first.at(myDimension) != myStartingPoint.at(myDimension)))
00119           {
00120             myPos--;
00121           }
00122       }      
00123 
00128       SpanIterator &operator++()
00129       {
00130         this->next();
00131         return *this;
00132       }
00133 
00138       SpanIterator &operator++ ( int )
00139       {
00140         SpanIterator tmp = *this;
00141         ++*this;
00142         return tmp;
00143       }
00144 
00145 
00150       SpanIterator &operator--()
00151       {
00152         this->prev();
00153         return *this;
00154       }
00155 
00160       SpanIterator &operator-- ( int )
00161       {
00162         SpanIterator tmp = *this;
00163         --*this;
00164         return tmp;
00165       }
00166 
00167     private:
00168       
00170       Point myStartingPoint;
00171       
00173       Iterator myPos;
00174 
00176       ImageContainerBySTLMap<Domain,ValueType> *myMap;
00177 
00179       std::size_t myDimension;
00180 
00181     };

00183     ImageContainerBySTLMap(const Point &aPointA,

00188     ValueType operator()(const Point &aPoint) throw( std::bad_alloc )
00189     {
00190       Iterator it = this->find( aPoint );
00191       if ( it == this->end() )
00192         throw std::bad_alloc();
00193       else
00194         return this->operator[]( aPoint );
00195     }
00196 
00197 
00198     ValueType operator()(const Iterator &it) throw( std::bad_alloc )
00199     {
00200       if ( it == this->end() )
00201         throw std::bad_alloc();
00202       else
00203         return (*it).second;
00204     }
00205     
00206 
00207     void setValue(const Point &aPoint, const ValueType &aValueType)
00208     {
00209       Iterator it  = find( aPoint ) ;
00210       if (it != this->end() )
00211         (*it).second = aValueType;
00212     }

00226     SpanIterator span_begin(const Point &aPoint, const std::size_t aDimension)
00227     {
00228       return SpanIterator ( aPoint, aDimension, this);
00229     }
00230 
00231     SpanIterator span_end(const Point &aPoint,const std::size_t aDimension)
00232     {
00233       Point tmp = aPoint;
00234       tmp.at( aDimension ) = myLowerBound.at( aDimension ) +
00235         myUpperBound.at( aDimension ) - 
00236         myLowerBound.at( aDimension ) + 1;
00237       return SpanIterator( tmp, aDimension, this);
00238     }
